title: Does Cumulus Broadcasting or Capital Broadcasting (Sunrise) plan to convert any of their locally owned FM radio stations to an HD format which offers local listeners more variety and a static free signal soon? (Both companies broadcast HD signals on their stations in Raleigh and other NC cities across the state. Why is it taking so long to get HD radio in Wilmington?  Only WHQR broadcasts in HD locally.)
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/07/does-cumulus-broadcasting-or-capital-broadcasting-sunrise-plan-to-convert-any-of-their-locally-owned-fm-radio-stations-to-an-hd-format/
